1686790.name: P1441vr
1686790.description:
P1441vr is a target shooting simulator inspired from the firearms training for John Wick. Focused more heavily on the action side of things this isn't for those looking for infinite guns and customizations, but if your looking to do some running and gunning this is for you.

INTERESTING AND ENGAGING COURSES

Train in a variety of scenarios from the four core game modes to choose from currently and more to be added.

SELECTION OF FIREARMS

Choose from a handful of firearms and Optics with semi realistic weapon handling.

DIFFICULTY AND MOVEMENT SETTINGS

All game modes have difficulty settings to accommodate different play styles and experience levels. Both TELEPORT and LOCOMOTION movement systems are supported as well as snap / smooth turning with degree / speed options.

Supports preferences for Right or Left handed shooters along with the body inventory.

GAME MODE OPTIONS

  • MOVE N SHOOT - Race against the clock as you move from station to station engaging a variety of challenging targets and obstacles.

  • TURN N GUN - Blast targets all around you in this fast paced mode. Arrows indicate which direction the targets are. Turn, shoot and turn again.

  • QUICKDRAW - How fast can you draw and send lead down range while keeping the shots inside the zones. This mode is all about speed and accuracy.

  • SIMUNITIONS - This mode tests your skills and puts you right into the action whether you are rescuing hostages or clearing rooms.
1686790.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
